message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and quality.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7200. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.
